Bangladesh: Iltutmish, Sultan of Delhi, invades Bengal and kills Ghiyasuddin Iwaj Shah, the last Khilji ruler.
China:
Xianzong died.
Emperor Mozhu of Western Xia became emperor of Western Xia.
France: Louis died.  He was succeeded by his son Louis IX.
India: Raja Prithu repulses invading forces of Ghiyas ud din Balban the ninth sultan of the Mamluk dynasty of Delhi, in present-day Assam
Poland: Issuance of Golden Bull of Rimini
Vietnam: Trần Thái Tông was crowned emperor of Đại Việt.
